Open Visits Total Visit Revisit Visit Sync Help Tips Data Clear Sync Data Contact us Sales Analytics Weather Reach us Share Log Please select following options to get started. The date you entered can not be current date or future date. Can I help you with anything else? Do you want to see the Total Visit\'s report date wise? Your Total Visits on\u0020 \u0020is\u0020 Check Attendance. Please enter date to check attendance status. Thank you. Do you want to see all the visit options? Thanks. Visit Are you Sure, because it will logout the APP and you need to Re-login with permissions? "Write to us:\n"
"1. Must have good internet while login otherwise below message appears:\n'Internet is disconnected, you can not login, please switch on the internet.' \n2. While login you make sure that the Login ID & Password you have entered is proper otherwise below message appears:\n'No Data Found.' \n3. While Login with proper Login ID & Password, if the following message appears:\n'Your IMEI is not authorised. Please connect with administrator.'\n Then please call to your Organization Head to inform this & once he authorized, you will be able to login successfully. \n4. Handset Changed? \nPlease talk to Organization Head about this, they will authorize this & you will be able to login successfully in your new handset."
"1. Slow Login? \na.If last day logout not done in APP, then it will first logout & then login. So, please logout everyday once work in app completed. \nb. If you have clear data in APP, then it will sync all data into the handset so that offline work in the APP to be possible. Hence, it will take some time. \nc. Important is stable internet connectivity to login faster. Check the internet please. \n2. After login what to do? \na. At Work: It will mark you present for the day with your In Time. You need to select the type of work also.\n ***Please look into Applicable In Time which is set as per your Organization policy. \nb. On Leave: It will mark you Leave for the day with the type of leave you selected. You have to select Leave From & To date & can put Remarks. \n3. Wish to see Attendance & Leave Reports?\nFrom top left select option to open Menu, then select 'View attendance' or otherwise from the Dashboard, select 'Attendance' displayed at top. \n4. Wish to change Password?\nAs per your Organisation policy, you may have to request Organization head to do this for you. If they allow you to do this by yourself, you may open menu options & select 'Change Password' to do the same. \n5. After Login & Attendance, wish to apply leave for future date? From menu option you will have option 'Apply Leave' to do the same."
Are you sure? typing... "Your attendance status is 'Leave'." "Your attendance status is 'Present'." "Your attendance status is 'Absent'." Do you want to see Attendance Report? Can not get attendance status. Visit is syncing from app already. Sync Successfully done. Thanks. Request Done. Sync is unsuccessful. "1. Wish to do a New Visit?\nJust Click on (+) floating icon after successful attendance. Your current location to be traced. Visit Data need to enter & save. \n2. Wish to do Revisit? \na. If you are at nearby location of the party you wish to visit, automatically push notification at top to be displayed & ask from you Revisit. Just select 'Yes' & put the neccessary details to complete Revisit. \nb. If you are not getting notification due to GPS issue, you may open left side menu option & check from 'Nearby' feature to get the list & from there you can Revisit. \nc. If you are not getting the list of Party for Revisit, talk to your Supervisor &/or Organisation head to help you out by increasing GPS value from portal. \n3. Wish to see visit reports?\nFrom the dashboard select 'Total Visits.' \n4. Wish to see the time you spent in each visits?\nFrom the dashboard select 'Visit Duration'. \n5. If you have Order Booking Facility, wish to see the orders you booked?\nFrom the Dashboard select 'Total Order(s).' \n6. Wish to see the places you move today with Timeline? \nFrom the Dashboard select 'Timeline'. You can view past days data also by selecting the different date."
"1. How to take Orders? \na. If you are doing Visit or Revisit to any party, once visit/revisit confirms by you, app will itself give you option to Book Order. You need to Select Items, Qty, Rate & can submit the order. \nb. Also from Dashboard, click on 'Party(s)' to get the list, from their you may select 'Order' to book this. It will show you existing order list of the party & one floating icon with (+) sign clicking on which you can book orders. \n2. Wish to see order history?\nFrom the Dashboard click on 'Orders', it will give you all the details & you can see upto Items, Qty, Rate level details. \n3. Orders not showing Rate or unable to enter Rate? \nTalk to your reporting head/Organization head to get this." Select language English Hindi Bengali Urdu Malayalam Tamil Kannada Telugu Marathi Oriya
